title: League of Legends
description: Master your champion, outsmart your opponents, and work with your team to destroy the enemy’s Nexus and claim victory!

title: Mario Kart 8 Deluxe
description: Race against friends in Mario Kart 8 Deluxe, where thrilling speed and wild power-ups lead to nonstop fun and chaos!

title: Dota II
description: Team up in Dota 2 for intense strategy, epic battles, and the fight to destroy the enemy’s Ancient!

title: King of Fighters XV
description: Unleash powerful combos and battle legendary fighters in King of Fighters IV for intense, fast-paced combat!

title: Forza Horizon 5
description: Experience thrilling open-world racing and explore stunning landscapes in Forza Horizon 5, where every drive is an adventure!

title: Halo Infinite
description: Step into the fight as Master Chief in Halo Infinite, where epic battles and a gripping story await in a vast, alien world!

title: Fortnite Spider-Man
description: Jump into the action in Fortnite, where you can build, battle, and swing into victory with the iconic Spider-Man skin!

title: Diablo III
description: Embark on a dark, thrilling quest in Diablo III, battling demons and collecting loot in a fight to save the world!
